title: Multimedia Specialist
job_overview:
We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Part-Time Multimedia Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing visually engaging content across various platforms, including social media, websites, and marketing materials. This role requires a strong understanding of design principles and the ability to translate ideas into compelling visuals that align with our brand.

Responsibilities:

Design and create graphics  and videos for social media posts, websites, ads, and marketing campaigns
Collaborate with the marketing manager to develop creative assets that support campaign objectives
Ensure all graphics are consistent with brand guidelines and maintain a cohesive visual identity
Edit and enhance existing designs based on feedback from teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
Stay updated on design trends to keep visuals fresh and relevant
Manage multiple design projects simultaneously and meet deadlines
Provide suggestions for visual improvements and creative input on new projects

Qualifications:

Proficiency in graphic design software and video editing (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Capcut, Premier, Canva)
Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and layout design
Excellent attention to detail and creativity
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
Portfolio showcasing previous design work

To set your expectations, this role will be fast paced and we don't want beginners as we're looking for someone who can deliver on time and communicates well (this is non-negotiable) this for us means the ideal candidate is adaptable due to their experience working in a similar role - if this isn't you please don't apply.

To apply, please put I'm confident for this role as your subject line and include a short video of why you are ideal for this role and what is your strength and weakness. Please also include your resume and portfolio in your submission - we will not accept applications that don't follow instructions.
